entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:32 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Freezing rain with rain early this evening and with ice pellets overnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to a few flurries and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
